original_text: Listen! The Lord Almighty has commanded this: All the work that people do to get things for themselves is useless. The things that the nations work so hard to get will become smoke! Listen! The Lord Almighty has commanded this: All the work that people do to get things for themselves is useless. The things that the nations work so hard to get will become smoke!
korean_text: 민족들이 불탈 것으로 수고하는 것과 나라들이 헛된 일로 피곤하게 되는 것이 만군의 여호와께로 말미암음이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty has commanded this:
All the work that people do to get things for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 자신들을 위해 물건을 얻으려 하는 모든 수고는

sentences.original_text: The things that the nations work so hard to get
